legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: 很高兴同瑞士日内瓦安全政策研究中心主任格雷明格见面。我们就朝鲜半岛形势及其他共同关心问题交换了意见。🇨🇳🇨🇭 https://t.co/ZXkT6NHuya

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: 我就近期半岛局势阐述中方原则立场，表示瑞士是拥有丰富调停经验的中立国，中方支持瑞士和日内瓦安全政策研究中心在助力半岛问题政治解决进程方面发挥积极作用。🇨🇳🇨🇭

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: 格雷明格赞赏中国为维护朝鲜半岛和平与稳定发挥的重要作用，表示日内瓦安全政策研究中心愿同中方加强沟通交流。🇨🇳🇨🇭 https://t.co/NVIj3Zh3WW

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: Delighted to meet with the Executive Director of the Geneva Center for Security Policy @TheGCSP Thomas Greminger @ThGreminger , We exchanged views on the situation on the #KoreanPeninsula and other issues of mutual interest.🇨🇳🇨🇭 https://t.co/hEgVuf3qlm

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: I said China supports Switzerland and the GCSP in playing an active role in facilitating a political settlement of the Peninsula issue.🇨🇳🇨🇭

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: Greminger expressed appreciation for China's critical role in maintaining peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, and said that the GCSP is ready to step up communication and exchanges with China.🇨🇳🇨🇭 https://t.co/63M9Yo9XLg

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: 中国和英国都是联合国安理会常任理事国，也是世界主要经济体，发展稳定互惠的中英关系符合两国人民根本利益，也有利于双方共同应对全球性挑战，促进世界和平与发展。双方应本着相互尊重、合作共赢的原则，共同推动中英关系健康稳定发展。

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: Maintaining and growing stable and mutually-beneficial bilateral ties serves the interests of both China and the UK and is conducive to world peace and development. We hope that the UK will work together with China for the sound and steady growth of bilateral ties.

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text:
很高兴出席第五届深圳书展，与各界读者朋友交流讲好中国故事的体会。

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: 今年以来，在世界经济复苏乏力、全球通胀水平仍然较高等复杂严峻的外部环境下，中国经济展现出强大韧性、潜力和活力，产业结构持续优化、新旧动能加快转换，不断开辟发展新领域新赛道，塑造发展新动能新优势。国际货币基金组织驻华代表称，中国仍是全球经济增长最大引擎，贡献全球增长量的三分之一。

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: 中国贸促会最新调查显示，近七成受访外企看好未来五年中国市场前景。外商参与进博会、服贸会、广交会、消博会等展会的热情持续高涨，以实际行动践行“开拓中国市场”的决心。

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: 中国将继续成为全球经济增长的压舱石和动力源。我们将继续推进高水平开放，推动高质量发展，同各国分享中国式现代化带来的新机遇，为世界经济复苏和全球发展繁荣作出更大贡献。

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: Since the year began, despite the complex and severe external environment, such as the sluggish global economic recovery and high global inflation rate, the Chinese economy has shown strong resilience, potential and dynamism.

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: According to the latest survey by the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade, nearly 70 percent of the surveyed foreign-funded enterprises expressed their confidence in the prospect of the Chinese market for the next five years.

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: Foreign businesses have been enthusiastic in taking part in the China Int'l Import Expo, China International Fair for Trade in Services, the Canton Fair and the China International Consumer Products Expo, which speaks to their readiness to keep exploring the Chinese market.

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: 当被问及朝鲜将关闭十几个驻外使领馆，包括驻香港总领馆，中国外交部发言人表示：各国均有权根据自身实际情况和需要决定设立或撤销该国驻外领事机构。中方尊重朝鲜关闭其驻香港总领馆的决定。

legacy.description: 中国政府朝鲜半岛事务特别代表，前驻英国、朝鲜、埃及大使，Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Korean Peninsula Affairs，Former Chinese Ambassador to Egypt, the DPRK and the UK
legacy.name: 刘晓明Liu Xiaoming

legacy.full_text: In response to the report that the DPRK closed a dozen diplomatic outposts, FM spokesperson said: Countries have the right to decide to establish or abolish their consular missions abroad. China respects the DPRK’s decision to close its Consulate-General in Hong Kong.
